metadata.title: Near-Realtime Arctic Change Indicators
metadata.description: Near-Realtime Arctic Change indicators provide information on the present state of Arctic ecosystems and climate in historical context.  Data and information from reputable scientific sources are presented with easy to read and understand narratives.  Categories include climate, global, land, marine ecosystem, ice, and human indicators.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The objective of the Arctic Change Indicators website is provide data and information from reputable scientific sources in historical context.  The objective is to inform dialog, raise issue awareness, and support decision making.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
